data.title: Foundation for California Community Colleges
data.meta_description: We Support Students We believe students of all backgrounds deserve equitable access to education and the support they need to achieve educational and career goals. Community Colleges We believe in the transformative power of the California Community Colleges system to change lives. Communities We believe community colleges are the heart of their communities and are
data.text:
As we look back on the past year, we see a time of great change but also one of opportunity that has called on us to work in new ways to address inequities and meet community needs.

Our annual Innovation and Impact Report provides insight into FoundationCCC priorities and successes for 2021-2022, and how all of this work was made possible through innovation – measured risk-taking, testing and trying new, bold approaches, and pushing ourselves to expand our impact where it’s needed most.

What started as a small auxiliary organization to fundraise for awards to outstanding faculty, staff, and colleges has since expanded, upholding our founder’s entrepreneurial and opportunistic spirit as a blueprint for success. From key partnerships and big ideas that have propelled us forward, these are the moments that tell the story of FoundationCCC.
